hasDescription().Description: Indicates whether the "description" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasLocation().Description: Indicates whether the "location" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasEndDate().Description: Indicates whether the "endDate" field is explicitly set to a value.

getEndDate().Description: The date that the person left this organization.

getStartDate().Description: The date that the person joined this organization.

hasName().Description: Indicates whether the "name" field is explicitly set to a value.

getDescription().Description: A short description of the person's role in this organization. Deprecated.

getTitle().Description: The person's job title or role within the organization.

getLocation().Description: The location of this organization. Deprecated.

hasDepartment().Description: Indicates whether the "department" field is explicitly set to a value.

getDepartment().Description: The department within the organization. Deprecated.

hasPrimary().Description: Indicates whether the "primary" field is explicitly set to a value.

getType().Description: The type of organization. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values: - "work" - Work. - "school" - School.

hasTitle().Description: Indicates whether the "title" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasStartDate().Description: Indicates whether the "startDate" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasType().Description: Indicates whether the "type" field is explicitly set to a value.

isPrimary().Description: If "true", indicates this organization is the person's primary one, which is typically interpreted as the current one.
